law.text: The willful failure of a prisoner to remain within the extended limits of his confinement, or to return within the time prescribed to an institution or facility to which he was committed or transferred to after commitment, constitutes an escape from custody punishable as provided in KRS 520.030.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 335. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 293, sec. 4.
